page.title: 04Transport (with mainland)
page.content: British Airways provide a daily helicopter service with Penzance.The journey taking approx. 20mins..The Isles os Scilly Steamship Company runs the 650 passenger and cargo ship Scillonian 111.This provides a daily return service in the summer but this is reduced in the winter.This company are also starting a Skybus fixed wing aeroplane service from St.Just to St. Mary's.At present this is purely a cargo service but it is hoped to include passengers in the near future. Brymon Airways also provide a summer service for travellers to Newquay and Plymouth with connections to Exeter, Gatwick and the Channel Islands.
